revised_title: Nitrogen Sources in Vegetation: Free Nitrogen Assimilation
tldr: This article discusses the sources of nitrogen in plants and the question of whether they assimilate free or uncombined nitrogen. The authors present experimental evidence and review previous research on nitrogen assimilation in plants, concluding that the atmosphere may not be a significant source of free nitrogen for plants. They also explore the role of soil minerals, atmospheric deposits, and other factors in plant nitrogen acquisition.
